tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE livestock_sales (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  customer_name VARCHAR(100),
  item_name VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  total_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE livestock_sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    livestock_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE livestock_purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_date DATE,
    livestock_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    breed TEXT,
    age INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialSummary (
    summary_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    total_sales DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    total_purchases DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    net_income DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    livestock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    species VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT REFERENCES Livestock(livestock_id),
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT REFERENCES Livestock(livestock_id),
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)
